channel.title: can't get off the train
channel.description: Hey i installed Black Mesa and it's running and all, but i can't get past the introduction. When the train arrives at Sector C, there should be a security to let me of the train but he won't show up. It doesn't freeze or crash, so no minidump, crashlog whatsoever. I already checked that the files I downloaded from gamefront aren't broken and did a reinstallation. If no-one has a solution I'd gladly take a savegame from just after this scene.

item.title: can't get off the train
item.dc:creator: hosdo
item.description:
This reminds me the bug I had with the original HL… When the guard came to open the door, he was killed by the electrified rail… Epic LoL

Read full topic

item.title: can't get off the train
item.dc:creator: Mr_GameCrazy
item.description:
miracolous:

Skipped the scene using map bms_c1a0b in the console, just missed putting on my HEV Suit and proceeded from there. Hope I don’t have to skip more memorable moments.

If you notice some more skipped scenes, you’ll need to go with TehBoxNoob’s suggestion.

Read full topic

item.title: can't get off the train
item.dc:creator: D3lta
item.description:
Dat avatar.

Seems like maybe some files might be corrupt.Atleast, thats what I discovered when I missed some parts.If that’s the case, try out a torrent mirror.

item.title: can't get off the train
item.dc:creator: miracolous
item.description:
Hey i installed Black Mesa and it’s running and all, but i can’t get past the introduction. When the train arrives at Sector C, there should be a security to let me of the train but he won’t show up. It doesn’t freeze or crash, so no minidump, crashlog whatsoever. I already checked that the files I downloaded from gamefront aren’t broken and did a reinstallation.
If no-one has a solution I’d gladly take a savegame from just after this scene.

Read full topic
